pair.title: Instructions
pair.intro: Enter the details of your Nuki Bridge below.
pair.titleselection: What do you want to do?
pair.nodevices: No hardware Nuki Bridge discovered. Did you push the button on your bridge during pairing? You can try again or use try manual pairing if you know the IP address and token of your Nuki (software) Bridge.
pair.testing: Connection test successful, you can now connect the Nuki Bridge.
pair.unknownerror: Unknown error. Are you sure you have entered the correct details and the Nuki Bridge is on the same network as Homey? Please check your settings and try again.
pair.step1: First, make sure the HTTP API in your Nuki Bridge is enabled. You can do this within the Nuki smartphone app. Go to "Manage my devices" and select "Bridge". There you can enable the HTTP API.
pair.step2: Once enabled, continue this procedure by tapping the button "Next >".
pair.step4: When the searching process is running, press the button of your Nuki Bridge.
pair.step5: Your Nuki devices will be discovered and you can complete the pairing procedure.
pair.nosettings: Please, fill in all the required fields.

util.401: Token is invalid, please re-pair your Nuki
util.404: Smart Lock is unknown, please re-pair your Nuki

driver.no_token: Did not receive a token from the bridge, make sure you push the bridge button during pairing.
